inputs.selection_motivation: Wheat is a core component of global grain supply; its production and price fluctuations directly drive overall grain price indices, making it a key influencer of grain prices.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Wheat prices are driven by weather, supply disruptions, and global trade policy, so the shortlist focuses on geopolitical and climate factors that can move grain supply and prices, plus tariff/traffic channels affecting shipments. The chosen topics include Ukraine-related geopolitics, major grain price drivers, climate events, and key wheat-trade policy actors.

proposed_link.motivation: Wheat is a core component of global grain supply; its production and price fluctuations directly drive overall grain price indices, making it a key influencer of grain prices.
